titles.title: Caguana Indigenous Ceremonial Park and Tibes Indigenous Ceremonial Center Study Act
Caguana Indigenous Ceremonial Park and Tibes Indigenous Ceremonial Center Study Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating Caguana Indigenous Ceremonial Park and Tibes Indigenous Ceremonial Center, as units of the National Park System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
Caguana Indigenous Ceremonial Park and Tibes Indigenous Ceremonial Center Study Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Caguana Indigenous Ceremonial Park and the Tibes Indigenous Ceremonial Center in Puerto Rico as units of the National Park System.
